Text:
SUPERB!
I heard a bit of 'Murder on the Orient Express' on BBC7 the other night and it was pretty good..so thought I'd come looking for it as I fell asleep and also don't know when the next episode is on.
This way I get to choose the time it is played  :)
Also I notice you have two versions of that story....interesting.
Thanks a lot, great seed!!
If you would be so kind as to provide a listing of what episodes are included. That would be great :)
if you click to 'Download this torrent' you will see this list in utorrent (or whatever you use) :)
Thanks Spalli for these well read novels by the queen of mystery.
